channel.title: Half life 1 problem
channel.description: Ok guys whenever im playing the first half life anytime my Hev suit talks the game shuts down and gets a critical error called (Sv Startsound=150) or something close to that...but whenever I turn the volume on the Hev suit down completely it works fine with no problems,anyone know a fix for this? any help would be appreciated :slight_smile:

item.title: Half life 1 problem
item.dc:creator: StickyBear
item.description:
baconeggs:

The HEV suit sound is set too high. The game wil crash if it’s raised higher than 70%. Find the maximum allowed value on Google, and type it into the GCF or console. PRoblem solved.

Hey thanks man its working, I cant believe it was that though :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Half life 1 problem

item.description:
The HEV suit sound is set too high. The game wil crash if it’s raised higher than 70%. Find the maximum allowed value on Google, and type it into the GCF or console. PRoblem solved.
